Title: Belphegor: Phantom of the Louvre
Writer: Arthur Bernède (novel), Jean-Paul Salomé, Danièle Thompson, Jérôme Tonnerre
Actors: Sophie Marceau, Michel Serrault, Frédéric Diefenthal, Julie Christie
Plot: At the Louvre museum in Paris, the phantom Belphegor wakes up and causes electrical havoc. Night guards at the museum start dying and Lisa gets possessed. Martin tries to help the cute Lisa.
